title: Apocalyptic & Infected Lands Audio Music Pack
description: The complete Apocalyptic & Infected Lands Audio Music Pack includes : 32 apocalyptic & horror original soundtracks and 14 ambient loops.
longDescription:
The complete Apocalyptic & Infected Lands Audio Music Pack v1.6.0 includes 32 original soundtracks( from 0:50 sec to 11 mins /track) , 26 Apocalyptic Loop-Ambients and includes four folders :


  • ORCHAPOCALYPSE FOLDER : Orchestral Apocalypse Folder (10 songs) for realistic projects.
  • RETROCALYPSE FOLDER : Retro Apocalypse – Infected Tunes Folder for retro pixelated - cartoon or sound tunes style (9 songs).
  • EXTRAS FOLDER : 11 Survival Orchestral OST, 4 Orchestral Apocalyptic Ambient Loops, the Christmas (2 Xmas OST+ 9 Ambients) & Halloween (15 Ambient Loops) and early much more...


The soundtracks are composed in order to give the pack the ambient perfect for Apocalyptic and Infected worlds and lands, epic battles at end of times, sad and melancholic songs, hordes ambients, akelarres , epidemic games and virus atmospheres, exploring at dead lands, zombies, mystery and any horror and apocalyptic ambient that your product needs.


It´s perfect for apocalypse, horror, psychological drama-thrillers, end of the world & classical requiem overtures and atmospheres, drama, mystery, suspense, action, epic, war, frenetic hymns, dead marches, relaxing songs full of sadness, Sci-Fi scenes, sad but hope ambients and for sadness feelings or scenes.

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  ORCHAPOCALYPSE FOLDER : Orchestral Apocalypse Folder (10 songs) for realistic projects.
  • RETROCALYPSE FOLDER : Retro Apocalypse – Infected Tunes Folder for retro pixelated - cartoon or sound tunes style (9 songs).
  • UPDATES FOLDER : 11 Orchestral OST, 4 Orchestral Apocalyptic Ambient Loops, the Christmas (2 Xmas OST+ 9 Ambients) & Halloween (15 Ambient Loops) Updates and early much more...
  • Documentation : Images, tracks list and quality.

Number of Audio Wavs: 60.

Number of Audio Cues: 60.

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bits.

Does music loop: Yes.

Minutes of audio provided: 200 mins (aprox).

Supported Development Platforms: All platforms detailed in the corresponding section.

Windows: Yes.

All the art by @VespaWarrior (http://www.vespawarrior.com/portfolio/).

Important/Additional Notes: Enjoy the package, good luck and thanks ;)
